titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: REPORTING PERIOD END DATE - Description

div.p: REPORTING PERIOD END DATE is the same as attribute REPORTING PERIOD END DATE.
REPORTING PERIOD END DATE is the end date of the REPORTING PERIOD and is used in conjunction with REPORTING PERIOD START DATE to specify the actual period the reported information relates to.
The date should not be before the REPORTING PERIOD START DATE although it can be the same if the period being reported only covers 1 day.
